item.description:
Earl Sholley is a strict constitutionalist. Barney Frank is
credited by many with causing the recent financial collapse.

Please attend the debate to support Earl Sholley and
show your opposition to Barney Frank.

The Sholley for Congress Campaign announces an
important debate with Congressman Barney Frank,
Chairman of the House Finance Services Committee,
and the key architect of the housing crash and the
ensuing financial meltdown.

The debate will be held at Wellesley College, Wellesley, MA
on Sunday, October 26th, 2008 at 4:30 PM. The debate will
be open to the public. Contact the Sholley Campaign at
508 528-8420(Main Office), 978 704-9014(Media Consultant
Ben Kilgore), or 508 699-3334(candidate's cellphone).
Contact the Frank Campaign at 617 965-0119. Wellesley
College can be reached at 781 283-1000. You can also look
for updates on our website at sholleyforcongress.us
item.name: Sholley-Frank Debate Oct. 26
